alert.note: Alert for Curry; Jackson; Josephine (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued July 26 at 2:55AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Pollution Advisory...in effect until 5 AM PDT Thursday. Wildfires burning in the region combined with forecast conditions will cause air quality levels to fluctuate and could be at unhealthy levels. Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected. Protect yourself and family members when smoke levels are high. - Stay inside if possible and keep windows and doors closed. - Avoid strenuous activity. - Use high efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters. - When air quality improves to moderate or healthy, open windows and doors to air out homes and businesses. - Cloth, dust and surgical masks do not protect you from harmful particles in smoke. Use approved respirators. For additional information...please visit the web site at http://www.oregon.gov/deq
